Nous chargeons ici les packages utiles: 

```{r setup}

# install and load R connector to COPASI software
# remotes::install_github("jpahle/CoRC")
library(CoRC)
library(knitr)
# load tidyverse packages
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(testthat)

# for Table reporting
library(flextable)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  out.width = "90%")
```
